testcase.name: Validate contact us page Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given Chrome is opened and opencart app is launched.........................passed Then User navigates onto landing page.......................................passed When User clicks on resources and selects contact us........................passed And User clicks on contact us...............................................passed Then User navigates on ContactUs page.......................................passed When User selects option from dropdown list.................................passed And user enters name "John" and Emailid "test123@gmail.com".................passed And User enters "Unable to login to account" in Message.....................passed And User selects the captcha................................................passed And User clicks on Send Message button......................................passed Then Contact Us form should be submitted....................................passed
